title: FF! Doc | UUIDGeneratorPipe
listItems: ALPHANUMERIC the UUID will not have a fixed length which will be about 42
NUMERIC a UUID with fixed length 31 will be generated
Required Support a current transaction; create a new one if none exists.
Supports Support a current transaction; execute non-transactionally if none exists.
Mandatory Support a current transaction; throw an exception if no current transaction exists.
RequiresNew Create a new transaction, suspending the current transaction if one exists.
NotSupported Do not support a current transaction; rather always execute non-transactionally.
Never Do not support a current transaction; throw an exception if a current transaction exists.

UUIDGeneratorPipe
PipesTranslator
Pipe that generates an UUID (Universally Unique Identifier). Only type alphanumeric guarantees a 100% unique identifier, type numeric has a 0.01% chance of exactly the same id in case of multiple calls on the same host within a few milliseconds.
See also
Github - UUIDGeneratorPipe Implementation Examples
Javadoc - org.frankframework.pipes.UUIDGeneratorPipe
Syntax
Copy
<UUIDGeneratorPipe name=""/>
Attributes
Required
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
name	text	-
The functional name of this pipe. It can be referenced by the path attribute of a PipeForward.
Optional
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
type	options	alphanumeric
Format of generated string.
Available Options:
ALPHANUMERIC the UUID will not have a fixed length which will be about 42
NUMERIC a UUID with fixed length 31 will be generated
FixedForwardPipe
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTIO
